metadata.title: Add Watermark to Images | Batch Shots
metadata.description: Add custom text or logo watermarks to your images easily. Protect your photos with watermarks with control over opacity, position, and size.
metadata.keywords: watermark, add watermark to images, photo watermark, watermark image, logo watermark, text watermark, image branding, watermark photos

loading.proDescription: Please wait while we verify your account status.

alerts.freeUserLimit: Free users can only process 1 image at a time. Upgrade to PRO to process up to 100 images in bulk!
alerts.watermarkFailed: Watermark application failed. Please try again.

info.title: ADD CUSTOM WATERMARKS
info.description: Protect your images with custom text or logo watermarks. Customize opacity, size, and position to match your branding needs.

freeMode.title: FREE MODE
freeMode.description: Process 1 image at a time. Upgrade to PRO to process up to 100 images in bulk!

proMode.title: PRO MODE
proMode.description: Process up to 100 images in bulk with your PRO account!

upload.title: Select Images
upload.helpTextFree: Free users can select 1 image at a time.
upload.helpTextPro: You can select up to 100 images at once.

plan.title: PRO PLAN
features: Watermark up to 100 images at once

step1.title: 1. SELECT YOUR IMAGES
step1.description: Upload one or more images you want to watermark.
step1.proNote: PRO users can select up to 100 images at once!

step2.title: 2. CUSTOMIZE WATERMARK
step2.description: Choose between text or logo watermarks. Adjust opacity, size, and position to your preferences.

step3.title: 3. DOWNLOAD & USE
step3.description: Apply your watermark and download the processed images ready for web, social media, or portfolio use.

proDialog.title: UPGRADE TO PRO
proDialog.description: Free users can only process 1 image at a time. Upgrade to PRO to watermark up to 100 images in bulk, saving you hours of work!
